Articles.Content:
I joined the KSP community in 0.19 but I never thought to make a back up of the game so now I was wondering if there is anywhere or anyway to get the previous versions to see what the game was like pre 0.19 and play around in each version

Basically, is there a way I can get the old versions back?
Unfortunately not. There is ahthread asround where you can download v0.7.3 to v0.13.3 because they'Re now freeware, but the other license can only be rediustributed by Squad.

I allways start a new save when a new version comes out. I dont have a copy of each, but I keep my own save file and have all since 0.17.

I hope that when the different versions become freeware, I can go back and laugh at my faults.
